name: code-exercises
description: Exercises, code-along, & proof of concepts from various books, labs, tutorials, blog posts and online courses.

scripts.install-deps: npm i -D babel-eslint eslint eslint-config-prettier eslint-plugin-html eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y eslint-plugin-prettier eslint-plugin-react  prettier-eslint prettier-eslint-cli
scripts.rm-deps: npm rm -D babel-eslint eslint eslint-config-prettier eslint-plugin-html eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y eslint-plugin-prettier eslint-plugin-react  prettier-eslint prettier-eslint-cli

author: James Priest
